G02·1 | Hammer of Bogardan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target.

trans-unit.resname: G02·1 | Hammer of Bogardan | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{R}{R}{R}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.
trans-unit.target: {2}{R}{R}{R}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.

G02·2 | Tradewind Rider | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.source: "'Tis a shame, in such a tempest, to have but one anchor."\n—Laurence Sterne, *Tristram Shandy*
